articles.title: Look up for the dazzling Eta Aquariid meteor shower Sunday and Monday - KSL.com
articles.description: May kicks off with the Eta Aquariid meteor shower, and experts are anticipating a better show than in recent years, according to the American Meteor Society.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON May kicks off with the Eta Aquariid meteor shower, and experts are anticipating a better show than in recent years, according to the American Meteor Society.
